UI_SELLER_INFO.TRADE_VOLUME: Total trade volume on the service in BTC

LAST_DEAL_DATE.TITLE: The date of the last deal

UI_STATUS_A0.STEP_SELLER_SIDE: Waiting the confirmation from the seller {{sellerName}}
UI_STATUS_A0.STATUS_INFO: You have sent a request to the seller. The deal will be opened after the confirmation from the seller's side.

UI_STATUS_A1.STATUS_INFO: The buyer is sending money to your wallet now. As soon as the buyer send the funds - you will be redirected to the next step.

UI_STATUS_A2.STEP_SELLER_SIDE: Waiting a seller's confirmation about receiving money

UI_STATUS_A3.STATUS_INFO_BUYER: The seller has fulfilled all conditions, not it's your turn. Send funds to the seller's details and confirm the sending. Pay the attention, firstly, you need to send money, and then confirm it. If you don't send money, the deal will be canceled. Bank commision is not expected in the total amount.
UI_STATUS_A3.STATUS_INFO_SELLER: The buyer is sending funds to your payment details now. Check the payment and confirm the availability of funds in your account. If you have some problems - you can always contact the buyer in chat or open the dispute to solve the problem.

UI_STATUS_A4.CARD_GET_BANK_NAME: About sending money to the card {{bankName}}
UI_STATUS_A4.STEP_STATUS_INFO: If you sent funds, wait to the seller's confirmation about receiving money. If something went wrong, you can always open the dispute and invite the service administrator to solve the problem.

UI_STATUS_A5.WALLET_INFO: From the Emporium account to your wallet
UI_STATUS_A5.FUNDS_SENT: the funds sent in the amount
UI_STATUS_A5.WATCH_TRANSACTION_PROCESS: You can watch the transaction process at
UI_STATUS_A5.STEP_STATUS_INFO: The seller has confirmed receiving your funds, and money from our temporary wallet is sending to yours now. Rate the speed and quality of service the seller. If you have any questions, you can contact us by Telegram or by mail.

UI_STATUS_B1.MAKE_TRANSACTION_TITLE: Make a transaction to the account
UI_STATUS_B1.STEP_STATUS_INFO: Send the cryptocurrency to the seller's account. The service comission is already added to the summ.

UI_STATUS_B2.STEP_BUYER_SIDE: Buyer sent funds to your cryptowallet
UI_STATUS_B2.FROM_WALLET_TITLE: Funds were sent from the wallet
UI_STATUS_B2.STEP_STATUS_INFO: Buyer sent funds to your payment details

UI_STATUS_B4.STEP_STATUS_INFO: The buyer is sending funds to your payment details now. Check the payment and confirm the availability of funds in your account. If you have some problems - you can always contact the buyer in chat or open the dispute to solve the problem.

UI_STATUS_C1.MAKE_TRANSACTION_TITLE: Make a transaction to the account
UI_STATUS_C1.STEP_STATUS_INFO: Send the cryptocurrency to the seller's account and confirm the sending. The service comission is already added to the summ and will be charged in the amount of 1% from the seller.

UI_STATUS_C2.WAITING_FUNDS_FROM_BUYER: Waiting funds from {{buyerName}} to your account.
UI_STATUS_C2.BUYER_MADE_TRANSACTION: Buyer {{buyerName}} made a transaction to the Emporium account
UI_STATUS_C2.FUNDS_GOT_FROM_YOU: Your funds were received to the Emporium account
UI_STATUS_C2.WAITING_FOR_FUNDS_FROM_YOU: Waiting funds from your side to be received the Emporium account
UI_STATUS_C2.SELLER_MADE_TRANSACTION: Seller {{sellerName}} made a transaction to the Emporium account
UI_STATUS_C2.WAITING_FOR_SELLERS_FUNDS: Waiting funds from {{sellerName}} to be received the Emporium account
UI_STATUS_C2.STEP_STATUS_INFO: The buyer is sending funds now. As soon as he confirm sending money, you will check them at your wallet.

UI_STATUS_C3.TO_WALLET_TITLE: From the {{buyerName}} account to your wallet
UI_STATUS_C3.FUNDS_SENT_TITLE: funds were sent in the amount
UI_STATUS_C3.FUNDS_SENT_TO: Funds were sent to the wallet you mentioned:

UI_STATUS_C4.STEP_STATUS_INFO: If you sent funds, wait the confirmation about receiving money from the seller. If something went wrong - you can always open the dispute and invite the service administrator to solve the problem.

UI_STATUS_CANCEL.STEP_STATUS_INFO: The deal can be manually canceled by seller or buyer. And also on the expiry of the acceptance the request by seller.

UI_STATUS_COMPLETE.WATCH_TRANSACTION_PROCESS: You can watch the transaction process

UI_LOGIN_ROUTE.2FA_INFO: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is the users identification method by requesting authentication data two different types. It provides two-layer and therefore more effective protection of the account from unauthorized entry.

UI_LOGIN_ROUTE.SKIP: Skip this step and enable 2FA later

UI_LOGIN_TWOFA_ENABLE.INSTRUCTION_1: Scan the QR-code with the 2FA-application using your phone. We recommend you the application

UI_DEAL_INFO.SERVICE_WARRANTY_DESCR: Emporium  service guarantee you clear exchanges. There are not any hidden fees and additional collectings. All information about funds and fees correctly appears!
UI_DEAL_INFO.SECURITY_DESCR: Don't worry! All your funds are in the safety. We use the simple scheme that provides safekeeping your money. If you have any problems or questions, you can always open the dispute and solve the problem.
UI_DEAL_INFO.BANK_REQ_DESCR: We do not use your personal information and do not give it to the third parties. Everything that is connected to bank cards and the details remain only inside our service. For more information you can read
UI_DEAL_INFO.DISPUTE_DESCR: Didn't like something? You can always open the dispute using the relevant icon in the chat. Service administrator will contact you, after opening the dispute, and solve all your problems.
